titleStmt.title: Sodom's vices destructive to other cities and states a sermon preached before the right honourable the lord mayor of the city of London, at the chappel of Guild-Hall, on Sunday August 1, 1697 / by Josiah Woodward ...
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Josiah, 1660-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Aylmer and A. Bell ...,

notesStmt.note: Half-title page has title: Mr. Woodward's sermon preach'd before the lord mayor at Guildhall Chappel, August 1, 1697.
Running title: A sermon preached before the lord mayor.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
